Text: Well, people been given and buying elections since, as long as elections have been around. I think the way to control it is to probably reduce the cost and maybe prohibit the politicians from seeking the amount of money they need to Prevail on the airwaves.

1. People have been attempting to influence elections by giving and spending money for a long time.
2. Elections have been around for a while and people have been trying to buy them or give money to influence them.
3. A way to control this issue might be to reduce the cost of elections.

5. Specifically, limiting the amount of money politicians can use for advertising on airwaves could help prevent the buying of elections.
